tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had Went to AK Clinic for my parent Dental treatment. Dr. Anirudh is soft spoken, he will explain our Teeth status and the treatment required. Dr. Anirudh not only explains the treatment to the patient but also will consider patient comfort during treatment especially old age ppl. My parent went for Dental Crown Treatment & Root Canal Treatment, where they never felt any discomfort during treatment, but also completed treatment  with no pain and no discomfort. I will surly recommend AK Dental Clinic Manikonda , bcoz it is worth for good dental treatment and completely worthful. And Thanks to Dr. Anirudh for giving a good dental  treatment for my parents .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Before visiting AK dental, I had root canal done to couple of my teeth at other dental hospital. But I was having continuous issues with those teeth and had paid so much for treatment and wasted my time. After knowing about AK Dental, I've visited the clinic and got treatment from Dr. Anirudh and I was really satisfied and very happy with the treatment. Dr. Anirudh has done re-root canal and fixed my teeth problem in single visit and I didn't experience any discomfort during and after treatment. Dr. Anirudh was very friendly and highly experienced Dentist. Also the hospital staff has made follow-up calls to know about my teeth health. It was really a good experience for me at Ak dental. Highly recommend this dental clinic and specially Dr.Anirudh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had failed root canals in the past. But I kept going to same doctor and believed in him as I thought my case was complicated. But after suggestion from my friend, I consulted Dr Anirudh and he gave me confidence that my problem will be solved with re-root canal treatment. So I underwent root canal again and this time, I had a successful root canal all thanks to Dr Anirudh.
